observation.output:
cd /tmp && /home/juan-all-hands/micromamba/bin/python -c "
from astropy.io import fits
import tempfile
import os
# Create the test case from the issue description
col = fits.Column('a', format='QD', array=[[0], [0, 0]])
hdu = fits.BinTableHDU.from_columns([col])
print('Column format:', col.format)
print('\"P\" in col.format:', 'P' in col.format)
print('\"Q\" in col.format:', 'Q' in col.format)
# Write to a temporary file
with tempfile.NamedTemporaryFile(suffix='.fits', delete=False) as f:
    temp_file = f.name
hdu.writeto(temp_file, overwrite=True)
# Read it back and check the format
hdu2 = fits.open(temp_file)[1]
print('After writing/reading:')
print('HDU2 columns[0].format:', hdu2.columns[0].format)
print('\"P\" in hdu2.columns[0].format:', 'P' in hdu2.columns[0].format)
print('\"Q\" in hdu2.columns[0].format:', 'Q' in hdu2.columns[0].format)
# Test FITSDiff on the same file
diff = fits.FITSDiff(temp_file, temp_file)
print(f'FITSDiff identical: {diff.identical}')
# Clean up
os.unlink(temp_file)
"
Column format: QD
"P" in col.format: False
"Q" in col.format: True
After writing/reading:
HDU2 columns[0].format: QD(2)
"P" in hdu2.columns[0].format: False
"Q" in hdu2.columns[0].format: True
FITSDiff identical: True

cd /tmp && /home/juan-all-hands/micromamba/bin/python -c "
from astropy.io import fits
import tempfile
import os

# Create the test case from the issue description
col = fits.Column('a', format='QD', array=[[0], [0, 0]])
hdu = fits.BinTableHDU.from_columns([col])

print('Column format:', col.format)
print('\"P\" in col.format:', 'P' in col.format)
print('\"Q\" in col.format:', 'Q' in col.format)

# Write to a temporary file
with tempfile.NamedTemporaryFile(suffix='.fits', delete=False) as f:
    temp_file = f.name

hdu.writeto(temp_file, overwrite=True)

# Read it back and check the format
hdu2 = fits.open(temp_file)[1]
print('After writing/reading:')
print('HDU2 columns[0].format:', hdu2.columns[0].format)
print('\"P\" in hdu2.columns[0].format:', 'P' in hdu2.columns[0].format)
print('\"Q\" in hdu2.columns[0].format:', 'Q' in hdu2.columns[0].format)

# Test FITSDiff on the same file
diff = fits.FITSDiff(temp_file, temp_file)
print(f'FITSDiff identical: {diff.identical}')

# Clean up
os.unlink(temp_file)
"
